DOC.detailed_description: To determine revascularization rate , clinical efficacy safety `` real-world setting '' CE-marked MindFrame System ischemic stroke patient thrombotic neurovascular occlusion cause embolus deemed appropriate endovascular treatment . Target vessel include basilar , internal carotid middle cerebral ( M1 M2 segment ) artery .
